summary: When a capable dancer is provoked by the evil design of his employer, naturally he will be out to prove his mettle.
cast: Prabhu Deva|Ganesh Acharya|Kay Kay Menon|Lauren Gottlieb|Dharmesh Yelande|Salman|Noorin Sha|Jayant Gadekar|Saroj Khan|Remo D'Souza|Mayuresh Wadkar|Prince R. Gupta|Vrushali Chavan|Rahul Shetty|Parag Choudhary|Prayas Choudhary|Sanjay Gurbaxani|Firoz A. Khan|Salman Yusuff Khan|Chotu Lohar|Elly Meyers|Punit Pathak|Sushant Pujari
title: ABCD (Any Body Can Dance)
